attributes.action: make it illegal for any public employee to continue to be entitled to taxpayer funded terminal grants and pensions after being forced to resign for failure or being sacked because of mismanagement, incompetence or having committed a criminal offence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Far too many senior public employees are being allowed to fail in their jobs and walk away with huge amounts of taxpayer pounds in terminal or severence grants AND ongoing pension pots.  When people quit because they have failed in the responsibilities for which they are contracted and receive remuneration from the public purse, or are sacked because of inefficiency or criminal activity then their terminal and pension rights should be forfeit.  (Any contributions made by the individual, from previous salary, should be refunded but taxpayer funded contributions to the pension pot should be returned to the public purse.
